TopicTitle: Convert Random Letters to a Sentence!

Articles.Content:
Uptown women offer too much appreciation.

jdsnvls

Took the first letter of the first name of my last few customers at work. Good luck. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Just don't send nails via laser signals.

usokfgfd

Use sentry overdrive, kill fat goblin floater dirigibles. 

Owlyfg

Only weird, lowly yappers fly goats.

hhfrty

Holy hot fries! Ratman took York!

bcdorf

Besides,cats don't often roast food.

zyxabc

Zoos, young Xavier, are basically cages.

lolwat

Loading oily laser water, arming tanks.

Milita

My Indian lobster is totally antisocial.

Lnospa

Lick nails or sausages per apoapsis

bacon

Balloon alert, computing offensive nails.

Babayaga

Beware, All Belgians Appreciate Yellowish Acidic Generic Ale. ( =[Duvel](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Duvel_Moortgat_Brewery#Duvel), ftw! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif))

Zolakwad

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-14T09:52:56Z" title="08/14/2015 09:52  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 14, 2015</time> by kreutzkevic**

Zimbabwe's official leisure activity: keeping wild animals defended...

Lfddlblv.

Legal fotbal defense directed international by left viagra

fitbpfe

From in the brain, pitiful fluency emerges. << Describes this thread, no?

efpbtif

Extremely Fierce Plutonium Bashing The International Forces.

CRABS

Cruising radically above Biome saltFlats

ghavhyu

Gather herbs and vaporize. Hopefully, you'll understand.

yvwvjs

Your views will vary -- just saying.

hephepur

Helpfully, Egrets procure heavy, eagle-powered, uber-raptors.

jekxls

Jebediah exemplifies Kerbals' "xerox"-like semblance.

... That "x" really made me have to work for a real sentence.

hclasnq

How come Larry always says 'No questions!'??

blarghie

Black, large ant roars gargantuously hot inside everyone

BDIFNEK

Blue donkeys in Florida nab enthusiastic Kerbals?

PCAQZIFRP

Precious cargo, after qualification, zooms infinitely far, rendering pixels.

atrfiut
